tool_description: API to download TikTok videos or images without a watermark.
name: Download TikTok Videos & Slide Images
title: Download TikTok Videos & Slide Images

api_list.name: POST VIDEO URL
api_list.description:
*/api*
-------------
**ENDPOINT It is used to post the tiktok video link and returns data **
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://download-tiktok-videos-slide-images.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "download-tiktok-videos-slide-images.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://download-tiktok-videos-slide-images.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
